AddAddressBook.title: AddAddressBook
AddAddressBook.summary: Adds the security access control address book, such as the IP address book, ECS tag address book, port address book, or domain name address book.

BatchCopyVpcFirewallControlPolicy.title: BatchCopyVpcFirewallControlPolicy
BatchCopyVpcFirewallControlPolicy.summary: Copies all access control policies from a policy group of a source virtual private cloud (VPC) firewall to a policy group of a destination VPC firewall.

CreateNatFirewallControlPolicy.title: CreateNatFirewallControlPolicy
CreateNatFirewallControlPolicy.summary: Creates an access control policy of the NAT firewall.

CreateTrFirewallV2.title: CreateTrFirewallV2
CreateTrFirewallV2.summary: Creates a virtual private cloud (VPC) firewall for a transit router.

CreateVpcFirewallCenConfigure.title: CreateVpcFirewallCenConfigure
CreateVpcFirewallCenConfigure.summary: Creates a virtual private cloud (VPC) firewall to protect traffic between a specified VPC and a network instance that is attached to a Cloud Enterprise Network (CEN) instance.

CreateVpcFirewallConfigure.title: CreateVpcFirewallConfigure
CreateVpcFirewallConfigure.summary: Creates a Virtual Private Cloud (VPC) firewall to protect traffic between two VPCs that are connected by using a Express Connect.

CreateVpcFirewallControlPolicy.title: CreateVpcFirewallControlPolicy
CreateVpcFirewallControlPolicy.summary: Creates an access control policy in a policy group for a virtual private cloud (VPC) firewall.

DeleteAddressBook.title: DeleteAddressBook
DeleteAddressBook.summary: Deletes an address book for access control.

DeleteNatFirewallControlPolicy.title: DeleteNatFirewallControlPolicy
DeleteNatFirewallControlPolicy.summary: Deletes an access control policy that is created for a NAT firewall.

DeleteTrFirewallV2.title: DeleteTrFirewallV2
DeleteTrFirewallV2.summary: Deletes a virtual private cloud (VPC) firewall that is created for a transit router.

DeleteVpcFirewallCenConfigure.title: DeleteVpcFirewallCenConfigure
DeleteVpcFirewallCenConfigure.summary: Deletes a virtual private cloud (VPC) firewall. The VPC firewall protects mutual access traffic between a VPC and a specified network instance that is attached to a Cloud Enterprise Network (CEN) instance.

DeleteVpcFirewallConfigure.title: DeleteVpcFirewallConfigure
DeleteVpcFirewallConfigure.summary: Deletes a virtual private cloud (VPC) firewall that controls traffic between two VPCs. The VPCs are connected by using an Express Connect circuit.

DeleteVpcFirewallControlPolicy.title: DeleteVpcFirewallControlPolicy
DeleteVpcFirewallControlPolicy.summary: Deletes an access control policy from a specific policy group for a virtual private cloud (VPC) firewall.

DescribeACLProtectTrend.title: DescribeACLProtectTrend
DescribeACLProtectTrend.summary: Queries the statistics on the requests that are blocked by the access control list (ACL) feature.

DescribeAddressBook.title: DescribeAddressBook
DescribeAddressBook.summary: Queries the details about an address book for an access control policy.

DescribeAssetList.title: DescribeAssetList
DescribeAssetList.summary: Queries the assets that are protected by Cloud Firewall.

DescribeControlPolicy.title: DescribeControlPolicy
DescribeControlPolicy.summary: Queries the details about all access control policies.

DescribeInstanceMembers.title: DescribeInstanceMembers
DescribeInstanceMembers.summary: Queries the information about members in Cloud Firewall.

DescribeInternetOpenIp.title: DescribeInternetOpenIp
DescribeInternetOpenIp.summary: Queries the IP addresses that are open to the Internet.

DescribeInvadeEventList.title: DescribeInvadeEventList
DescribeInvadeEventList.summary: Queries the information about the breach awareness events of a firewall.

DescribeNatFirewallControlPolicy.title: DescribeNatFirewallControlPolicy
DescribeNatFirewallControlPolicy.summary: Queries the information about all access control policies that are created for NAT firewalls.

DescribeNatFirewallPolicyPriorUsed.title: DescribeNatFirewallPolicyPriorUsed
DescribeNatFirewallPolicyPriorUsed.summary: Queries the priority range of access control policies that are created for a NAT firewall.

DescribeOutgoingDestinationIP.title: DescribeOutgoingDestinationIP
DescribeOutgoingDestinationIP.summary: Queries the information about the destination IP addresses in outbound connections.

DescribeOutgoingDomain.title: DescribeOutgoingDomain
DescribeOutgoingDomain.summary: Queries the information about the domain names in outbound connections.

DescribePolicyAdvancedConfig.title: DescribePolicyAdvancedConfig
DescribePolicyAdvancedConfig.summary: Queries whether the strict mode is enabled for an access control policy.

DescribePolicyPriorUsed.title: DescribePolicyPriorUsed
DescribePolicyPriorUsed.summary: Queries the priority range of the access control policies that match specific query conditions.

DescribeRiskEventGroup.title: DescribeRiskEventGroup
DescribeRiskEventGroup.summary: Queries the details of intrusion events.

DescribeRiskEventPayload.title: DescribeRiskEventPayload
DescribeRiskEventPayload.summary: Queries the attack payloads of intrusion events.

DescribeTrFirewallV2RoutePolicyList.title: DescribeTrFirewallV2RoutePolicyList
DescribeTrFirewallV2RoutePolicyList.summary: Queries the routing policies of a virtual private cloud (VPC) firewall that is created for a transit router.

DescribeTrFirewallsV2Detail.title: DescribeTrFirewallsV2Detail
DescribeTrFirewallsV2Detail.summary: Queries the details of the virtual private cloud (VPC) firewalls that are created for transit routers.

DescribeTrFirewallsV2List.title: DescribeTrFirewallsV2List
DescribeTrFirewallsV2List.summary: Queries the virtual private cloud (VPC) firewalls that are created for transit routers.

DescribeUserAssetIPTrafficInfo.title: DescribeUserAssetIPTrafficInfo
DescribeUserAssetIPTrafficInfo.summary: Queries the information about the traffic of a specified asset that belongs to your Alibaba Cloud account.

DescribeVpcFirewallAclGroupList.title: DescribeVpcFirewallAclGroupList
DescribeVpcFirewallAclGroupList.summary: Queries the information about all policy groups of access control policies that are created for virtual private cloud (VPC) firewalls.

DescribeVpcFirewallCenDetail.title: DescribeVpcFirewallCenDetail
DescribeVpcFirewallCenDetail.summary: Queries the details about a virtual private cloud (VPC) firewall. The VPC firewall protects access traffic between a VPC and a network instance that is attached to a Cloud Enterprise Network (CEN) instance.

DescribeVpcFirewallCenList.title: DescribeVpcFirewallCenList
DescribeVpcFirewallCenList.summary: Queries virtual private cloud (VPC) firewalls. Each VPC firewall protects mutual access traffic between a specified VPC and a network instance that is attached to a Cloud Enterprise Network (CEN) instance.

DescribeVpcFirewallControlPolicy.title: DescribeVpcFirewallControlPolicy
DescribeVpcFirewallControlPolicy.summary: Queries the information about the access control policies for a specified virtual private cloud (VPC) firewall.

DescribeVpcFirewallDefaultIPSConfig.title: DescribeVpcFirewallDefaultIPSConfig
DescribeVpcFirewallDefaultIPSConfig.summary: Queries the intrusion prevention configurations of a virtual private cloud (VPC) firewall.

DescribeVpcFirewallDetail.title: DescribeVpcFirewallDetail
DescribeVpcFirewallDetail.summary: Queries the details about a virtual private cloud (VPC) firewall. The VPC firewall controls traffic between two VPCs that are connected by using an Express Connect circuit.

DescribeVpcFirewallList.title: DescribeVpcFirewallList
DescribeVpcFirewallList.summary: Queries the details about virtual private cloud (VPC) firewalls by page. Each VPC firewall protects traffic between two VPCs that are connected by using an Express Connect circuit.

DescribeVpcFirewallPolicyPriorUsed.title: DescribeVpcFirewallPolicyPriorUsed
DescribeVpcFirewallPolicyPriorUsed.summary: Queries the priority range of access control policies that are created for a virtual private cloud (VPC) firewall in a specific policy group.

DescribeVulnerabilityProtectedList.title: DescribeVulnerabilityProtectedList
DescribeVulnerabilityProtectedList.summary: Queries the vulnerabilities that are supported by Cloud Firewall.

ModifyAddressBook.title: ModifyAddressBook
ModifyAddressBook.summary: Modifies the address book that is configured for access control.

ModifyControlPolicy.title: ModifyControlPolicy
ModifyControlPolicy.summary: Modifies the configurations of an access control policy.

ModifyControlPolicyPosition.title: ModifyControlPolicyPosition
ModifyControlPolicyPosition.summary: Modifies the priority of an IPv4 access control policy for the Internet firewall. An IPv4 access control policy refers to a policy whose source IP address and destination IP address are IPv4 addresses.

ModifyInstanceMemberAttributes.title: ModifyInstanceMemberAttributes
ModifyInstanceMemberAttributes.summary: Updates the information about members in Cloud Firewall.

ModifyNatFirewallControlPolicy.title: ModifyNatFirewallControlPolicy
ModifyNatFirewallControlPolicy.summary: Modifies the configurations of an access control policy that is created for a NAT firewall.

ModifyNatFirewallControlPolicyPosition.title: ModifyNatFirewallControlPolicyPosition
ModifyNatFirewallControlPolicyPosition.summary: Modifies the priority of an access control policy that is created for a NAT firewall.

ModifyPolicyAdvancedConfig.title: ModifyPolicyAdvancedConfig
ModifyPolicyAdvancedConfig.summary: Enables or disables the strict mode for an access control policy.

ModifyVpcFirewallCenConfigure.title: ModifyVpcFirewallCenConfigure
ModifyVpcFirewallCenConfigure.summary: Modifies the configurations of a virtual private cloud (VPC) firewall. The VPC firewall protects mutual access traffic between a VPC and a specified network instance that is attached to a Cloud Enterprise Network (CEN) instance.

ModifyVpcFirewallCenSwitchStatus.title: ModifyVpcFirewallCenSwitchStatus
ModifyVpcFirewallCenSwitchStatus.summary: Enables or disables a virtual private cloud (VPC) firewall. The VPC firewall protects mutual access traffic between a VPC and a specified network instance that is attached to a Cloud Enterprise Network (CEN) instance.

ModifyVpcFirewallConfigure.title: ModifyVpcFirewallConfigure
ModifyVpcFirewallConfigure.summary: Modifies the configurations of a virtual private cloud (VPC) firewall. The VPC firewall controls traffic between two VPCs that are connected by using an Express Connect circuit.

ModifyVpcFirewallControlPolicy.title: ModifyVpcFirewallControlPolicy
ModifyVpcFirewallControlPolicy.summary: Modifies the configurations of an access control policy that is created for a virtual private cloud (VPC) firewall in a specified policy group.

ModifyVpcFirewallControlPolicyPosition.title: ModifyVpcFirewallControlPolicyPosition
ModifyVpcFirewallControlPolicyPosition.summary: Modifies the priority of an access control policy that is created for a virtual private cloud (VPC) firewall in a specific policy group.

ModifyVpcFirewallDefaultIPSConfig.title: ModifyVpcFirewallDefaultIPSConfig
ModifyVpcFirewallDefaultIPSConfig.summary: Modifies the intrusion prevention configurations of a virtual private cloud (VPC) firewall.

ModifyVpcFirewallSwitchStatus.title: ModifyVpcFirewallSwitchStatus
ModifyVpcFirewallSwitchStatus.summary: Enables or disables a virtual private cloud (VPC) firewall. The VPC firewall protects traffic between two VPCs that are connected by using an Express Connect circuit.

PutEnableAllFwSwitch.title: PutEnableAllFwSwitch
PutEnableAllFwSwitch.summary: Enables a firewall for all public IP addresses within your Alibaba Cloud account.

ResetVpcFirewallRuleHitCount.title: ResetVpcFirewallRuleHitCount
ResetVpcFirewallRuleHitCount.summary: Clears the count on hits of an access control policy that is created for a virtual private cloud (VPC) firewall in a specific policy group.
